Andhra Pradesh.name: Andhra Pradesh
Andhra Pradesh.description: Known for its rich history, classical dance forms like Kuchipudi, and the famous Tirupati temple.

Arunachal Pradesh.name: Arunachal Pradesh
Arunachal Pradesh.description: Famous for its picturesque landscapes, tribal culture, and Buddhist monasteries like Tawang.

Assam.name: Assam
Assam.description: Known for its tea gardens, rich culture, and the annual Bihu festival.

Bihar.name: Bihar
Bihar.description: A state with a rich historical legacy, home to ancient universities like Nalanda and the Mahabodhi Temple.

Chhattisgarh.name: Chhattisgarh
Chhattisgarh.description: Known for its tribal culture, waterfalls, and the beautiful Chitrakoot Falls.

Goa.name: Goa
Goa.description: Famous for its beaches, Portuguese heritage, and vibrant festivals like Carnival.

Gujarat.name: Gujarat
Gujarat.description: Known for its vibrant culture, the white salt desert of Rann of Kutch, and the historic city of Ahmedabad.

Haryana.name: Haryana
Haryana.description: A state known for its agricultural prowess, traditional wrestling (Kushti), and vibrant festivals.

Himachal Pradesh.name: Himachal Pradesh
Himachal Pradesh.description: Known for its scenic beauty, hill stations like Shimla, and vibrant cultural festivals.

Jharkhand.name: Jharkhand
Jharkhand.description: Rich in mineral resources, known for its waterfalls, and tribal culture.

Karnataka.name: Karnataka
Karnataka.description: Known for its rich history, the IT hub Bengaluru, and classical dance forms like Bharatanatyam.

Kerala.name: Kerala
Kerala.description: Known as 'God's Own Country', famous for its backwaters, Ayurveda, and vibrant festivals.

Madhya Pradesh.name: Madhya Pradesh
Madhya Pradesh.description: Known for its rich heritage, temples like Khajuraho, and the wildlife at Kanha National Park.

Maharashtra.name: Maharashtra
Maharashtra.description: Home to Bollywood, the bustling city of Mumbai, and historical sites like Ajanta and Ellora caves.

Manipur.name: Manipur
Manipur.description: Known for its classical dance form, Manipuri, and the scenic Loktak Lake.

Meghalaya.name: Meghalaya
Meghalaya.description: Known as the 'Abode of Clouds', famous for its living root bridges and the wettest place on Earth, Mawsynram.

Mizoram.name: Mizoram
Mizoram.description: Known for its rolling hills, rich tribal culture, and bamboo dance (Cheraw).

Nagaland.name: Nagaland
Nagaland.description: Famous for its vibrant tribal festivals and the scenic beauty of its hills and valleys.

Odisha.name: Odisha
Odisha.description: Known for its ancient temples, Puri's Jagannath Temple, and classical dance Odissi.

Punjab.name: Punjab
Punjab.description: Known for its vibrant culture, Bhangra dance, and the Golden Temple in Amritsar.

Rajasthan.name: Rajasthan
Rajasthan.description: Known for its majestic forts, palaces, and the Thar Desert.

Sikkim.name: Sikkim
Sikkim.description: Known for its biodiversity, stunning landscapes, and the famous Rumtek Monastery.

Tamil Nadu.name: Tamil Nadu
Tamil Nadu.description: Known for its Dravidian-style temples, Carnatic music, and classical dance Bharatanatyam.

Telangana.name: Telangana
Telangana.description: Known for its rich history, Hyderabad's Charminar, and its spicy cuisine.

Tripura.name: Tripura
Tripura.description: Known for its tribal culture, palaces, and the Neermahal Palace.

Uttar Pradesh.name: Uttar Pradesh
Uttar Pradesh.description: Known for its historical significance, including the Taj Mahal, and its vibrant culture.

Uttarakhand.name: Uttarakhand
Uttarakhand.description: Known for its scenic beauty, pilgrimage sites, and adventure sports.

West Bengal.name: West Bengal
West Bengal.description: Known for its rich cultural heritage, the city of Kolkata, and the Sundarbans.
